description: Adds or subtracts a static number of months to an existing date provided from a property.

properties.name: date
properties.label: Date Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the property which contains the date.

properties.name: month
properties.label: Months
properties.description: Provide the name of the property which contains the number of months to be added to the date.

properties.name: outprop
properties.label: Output Property
properties.description: Provide the name of the output property which contains the calculated date.
